{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RP-N12 |revision=A1 |upc= |ean= |asin=B013LKLK2M;US;,B00YSL9H92;DE; |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/23/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=access point, range extender, media bridge |fcc_id=MSQ-RPN12 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.1 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7628N |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q32FVS1G |fla1_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9412G6KH-5 |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7628N |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |tp_firmware=Padavan ? |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=ASUS_RPN12 |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=1C:87:2C |oui_eth=1C:87:2C }} {{TagLine|Wireless-N300 Range Extender/Access Point/Media Bridge}} [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RPN12/ Product page] *External antenna enhances Wi-Fi signal coverage and boosts your Wi-Fi everywhere *Quick and secure setup via a press of the WPS button *Smart LED signal indicator helps you find the best location for optimum Wi-Fi performance *Roaming Assist helps you to get a stable connection everywhere in the home or office ===Specifications=== *Product Segment: 802.11b/g/n 2T2R :N300: 300Mbps (2.4GHz, 20/40MHz) *Antenna: 2x 2dBi fixed external antenna *Ports: 1x RJ45 for 10/100 BaseT for WAN *Power Supply: :AC Input : 100~240V (50/60Hz) 0.1A :DC Output : 5V with max 1A current *Dimensions: 81 x 55 x 34 mm (LxWxH) *Weight: 110 g ==Additional external links== ===Misc=== *[http://www.mediatek.com/en/news-events/mediatek-news/mediatek-launches-mt7628-industrys-first-80211n-2t2r-ap-soc-for-home-router-smart-router-and-iot-gateway/ MediaTek press release] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/ru/component/content/article/198-asus-rp-n12.html On '''FoxNetwork'''] :SoC: [[MediaTek]] MT7628N @580MHz (2T2R 802.11bgn) :Flash: ''Winbond'' W25Q32FVS1G (4MB SPI) :RAM: ''Winbond'' W9412G6KH-5 (16MB DDR) ===Serial===

===See also=== * [http://www.asus.com/event/2014/network/ASUS_AC_family_chart/solutions.html Asus Wireless AC networking solutions] * [http://www.asus.com/us/site/routers/DD-WRT/ Asus Routers with DD-WRT firmware support] * [http://event.asus.com/2013/nw/ASUSWRT/index.htm AsusWRT Support List] * [http://www.hub.ru/wiki/Devices_ASUS_WL_Routers Devices ASUS Routers] ====Wireless Range Extender==== * [[ASUS RP-N14]] N300 (300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RPN14/ Product Page] * [[ASUS RP-N53]] N600 (300+300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RPN53/ Product Page] * [[ASUS RP-AC52]] AC750 (300+433Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RPAC52/ Product Page] ====Wireless Router==== * [[ASUS RT-N54U]] N600 (300+300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTN54U/ Product Page] * [[ASUS RT-N14U]] N300 (300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTN14U/ Product Page] __NOTOC__
